tasks.label: Test Minimal Payloads
args:
🧪 TESTING MINIMAL PAYLOADS - Open Browser DevTools!

1. Start dev server: npm run dev
2. Open: http://localhost:3000/collections
3. Select any collection (e.g., Partners)
4. Edit an existing item
5. Open Browser DevTools -> Console
6. Change ONLY the title field
7. Click 'Save as Draft' or 'Publish'
8. Look for these console logs:
   • '🔍 Change detection:' - shows what changed
   • '🔄 Optimized API Data:' - shows minimal payload
   • '📤 Sending minimal update payload:' - from context

✅ SUCCESS: You should see {"title": "New Title"}
❌ FAILURE: You see full object with type, data, etc.

Test other scenarios:
• Change only status: should send {"status": "published"}
• Change title + slug: should send {"title": "...", "slug": "..."}
• Change description: should send full payload

This matches your working curl command! 🚀
